extendedInfo.description: This education puzzle game to remember the name of the prefecture of Japan Prefecture location or by playing a puzzle.I have created a game that can be enjoyed.(for the study is not.)[Training]There are prefecture notation and border. [Basic]There are prefecture notation.[Expert]There is no hint.When you're stuck on finding the location of a prefecture, use the [Assist] function. It will help you to navigate the correct location without hassling yourself. However you will be added a 30 seconds penalty when you use the [assist] function. If you want to achieve a higher ranking, it'd better not to use this function.*Support tablet.----*Have a problem with the app starting and staying blank with Samsung Galaxy S3.Work around by turning on Developer options and checking the box for 'Disable Hardware overlays'.

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: This app is very helpfull. It helps you learn and chalenges you with trophies and rankings. I noticed quick improvement.
reviews.author: Brittany Bergeron

reviews.title: Fun but could use more options
reviews.comment: Only took me a day to get from 9m to almost 1.5m on each level, but I don\'t feel like I\'m doing more than memorizing shapes.  Also, I see some rankings of about 30s which seems far fetched, it\'s one thing to know this perfectly but another to accurately and quickly place everything.  But no biggie.  I\'d really really like it if there was an option to only have the name and no image of the location, just a dot to place the name.
reviews.author: Chris Sklenarik

reviews.title: Professional application
reviews.comment: I have to say that this a professional application. Please give it a try.
reviews.author: Genjitsu Uzumaki

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I have been playing this on my daily train ride. I have improved my time every game.
reviews.author: Brian Bohrson

reviews.title: Really like this
reviews.comment: I  really like this app. It\'s pretty fun fitting the prefectures like a puzzle. There\'s training, basic and advanced modes. I also like how you can switch the language between Japanese and English. This app is great for anyone wanting to learn the prefectures of Japan.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best developer
reviews.comment: I like every app by digital gene nice and professional designed. High quality image.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like :D
reviews.comment: This made knowing where all the prefectures of japan are so easy :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Fun and learning geography at the same time. I\'ve almost got all the prefecture names down :)
reviews.author: Andrea M

reviews.title: so cool
reviews.comment: awesome app so cool and easy :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Reverse version would be great (match province names rather than shapes)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Genie in an App
reviews.comment: Digital Gene is a pleasant surprise.  Clean, and runs smoothly.  Educational and entertaining all in one package.  I\'ve installed several of their apps on both my iPod and Android phone and look forward to their future developments.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No graphics
reviews.comment: No graphics. Unless I try to quit. Reinstalled many times. Fixed by enableing Developer options and checking \"disable hardware overlays\"
reviews.author: Thomas Cutler
